alert.note: Alert for Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 21 at 8:57PM CST until February 21 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN WISE AND NORTHEASTERN PARKER COUNTIES... At 857 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Springtown, or 9 miles west of Briar, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Azle, Briar, Reno, Springtown, Boyd, Poolville, Cottondale and Sanctuary. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
